items.content_html: got-scraping-client is a lightweight and efficient tool for web scraping tasks using the popular Got HTTP client. It simplifies data extraction from web pages by providing a straightforward API and built-in support for handling common challenges like pagination and rate limiting.
items.title: sazzadhossainmilon/got-scraping-client: got-scraping-client is a lightweight and efficient tool for web scraping tasks using the popular Got HTTP client. It simplifies data extraction from web pages by providing a straightforward API and built-in support for handling common challenges like pagination and rate limiting.

items.content_html: A lightweight package to upload files—both local and remote—to Notion via the Notion API. Supports internal (local) and external (URL-based) file uploads.

items.content_html: A lightweight event-driven microservices package for RabbitMQ in Node.js. Enables asynchronous communication, message publishing and consuming, and scalable event-driven architecture. Perfect for distributed systems and real-time applications.
items.title: ChandanJain009/nodejs-nano-service: A lightweight event-driven microservices package for RabbitMQ in Node.js. Enables asynchronous communication, message publishing and consuming, and scalable event-driven architecture. Perfect for distributed systems and real-time applications.

items.content_html: Bitcoin Signal Analyzer — A lightweight Next.js app that visualizes Bitcoin trends using ATH, ATL, and EMA70 on the 1W chart. Powered by CoinGecko API, it generates basic bullish/bearish signals for traders, with support for email alerts, ads, and affiliate monetization.
items.title: zeevarblocks/bitcoin-signal-analyzer: Bitcoin Signal Analyzer — A lightweight Next.js app that visualizes Bitcoin trends using ATH, ATL, and EMA70 on the 1W chart. Powered by CoinGecko API, it generates basic bullish/bearish signals for traders, with support for email alerts, ads, and affiliate monetization.

items.content_html: Sim Studio is an open-source AI agent workflow builder. Sim Studio's interface is a lightweight, intuitive way to quickly build and deploy LLMs that connect with your favorite tools.
items.title: simstudioai/sim: Sim Studio is an open-source AI agent workflow builder. Sim Studio's interface is a lightweight, intuitive way to quickly build and deploy LLMs that connect with your favorite tools.

items.content_html: Real-time Text Sharing App is a lightweight, private, real-time text sharing platform built using Node.js, TypeScript, and the ws WebSocket library. It allows users to create or join private rooms where they can instantly share messages with others in real time.

items.content_html: AmbuStatus is a lightweight monitoring system designed for ambulance stations. It detects whether ambulances are parked in their designated bays inside the garage and displays their status live on a screen in the crew common area.
items.title: orc13a/AmbuStatus: AmbuStatus is a lightweight monitoring system designed for ambulance stations. It detects whether ambulances are parked in their designated bays inside the garage and displays their status live on a screen in the crew common area.
